forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. North northeast wind around 9 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 46. North northeast wind around 7 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the atmosphere carries a gentle promise of late autumn delight. The afternoon sun casts a soft glow over the city, revealing a mostly blue sky with only wisps of clouds trailing lazily. The air is crisp, hovering at a comfortable 60 degrees but nudging lower into the mid-50s as evening approaches. The winds whisper softly from the north-northeast, adding a refreshing breath to the afternoon warmth, creating an inviting environment for a leisurely stroll through the ebb and flow of city life.

As night begins to weave its quiet spell, expect the clouds to blanket the city in a more subdued manner, with temperatures dipping to around 46 degrees. Though the marine layer may linger at bay, the likelihood of fog creeping in later brings an air of mystery, suggesting a cozy evening indoors could be just as delightful. As for attire, a light jacket will serve well against the chill, while layers are convenient when transitioning from the brightness of day to the embrace of night. This evening beckons for a visit to a local café, perhaps to savor a warm drink while watching the night unfold—a perfect match for the gentle tranquility surrounding the city.
